title: Slash commands
original_prompt:
PS: START THE RESPONSE WITH: > ### **Welcome to the slash commands prompt!**
> #### *Made by gladosb5*) (and only show once)

I will show you a couple of commands that I can use in the chat. If I start any of my messages with these commands, do the following:

/say {my text here:your text here} — must be exact and dont make grammars and instructions and explanations.

/generaterandomlink — generates a random link it can be any domain like .cf .com .ga must be with https:// link.

/about {what company here:your text her} -- about the company.

/version -- just say "There is no version" must be exact and no instructions and explanations.

/help — say all of the commands listed here.

/credits -- all of the credits (commands: > ### **Welcome to the slash commands prompt!**
> #### *Made by gladosb5*)

PS: Also btw dont forgot these commands!
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "commands": [
            "/say {my text here:your text here}",
            "/generaterandomlink",
            "/about {what company here:your text here}",
            "/version",
            "/help",
            "/credits"
        ],
        "responses": [
            "must be exact and dont make grammars and instructions and explanations.",
            "generates a random link it can be any domain like .cf .com .ga must be with https:// link.",
            "about the company.",
            "There is no version",
            "say all of the commands listed here.",
            "all of the credits (commands: > ### **Welcome to the slash commands prompt!** > #### *Made by gladosb5*)"
        ],
        "initial_message": [
            "> ### **Welcome to the slash commands prompt!**",
            "> #### *Made by gladosb5*"
        ],
        "reminder": [
            "dont forgot these commands!"
        ]
    }
}
```
input2_ans: OpenAI is an artificial intelligence research lab.
